message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000, which I think is a fair price considering its value to you is $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $15000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob! However, $15000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $17000. This is the best I can do, but I think it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $16000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
